translations: v.懊悔，惋惜；（用于正式书面语）对......感到抱歉，对......感到遗憾；<古>对（损失或缺乏）感到痛惜
n.遗憾，惋惜；（因无法出席会议、聚会等的）致歉语

phrs.translation: 对做过的事表示遗憾、后悔

sentences.sentence: I deeply regret what I said.
sentences.translation: 我非常后悔说了那些话。

sentences.sentence: I came to regret my unconsidered remarks.
sentences.translation: 我对我那些考虑不周的言辞开始感到后悔。

sentences.sentence: She looked back on the past without regret.
